t: What marketers need to know about Gen Alpha | Marketing Dive
s: August 2, 2023 - Gen Alpha and Gen Z share eight of the top 10 favorite brands, but at different rates, with Gen Alpha preferring Netflix (their top brand), Disney and Nintendo at a higher rate than Gen Z. Meanwhile, nearly half (47%) of Gen Z name Amazon as a favorite brand compared to just 29% of Gen Alpha.
